content.raw:
Have one report of a gzserver crash that gave this backtrace:

~~~
Core was generated by `gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so vrc_task_1.world -q -r --record_encodin'.
Program terminated with signal 5, Trace/breakpoint trap.
#0  0x00007f9389f316e0 in ros::Connection::initialize(boost::shared_ptr<ros::Transport> const&, bool, boost::function<bool (boost::shared_ptr<ros::Connection> const&, ros::Header const&)> const&) ()
   from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f9389f316e0 in ros::Connection::initialize(boost::shared_ptr<ros::Transport> const&, bool, boost::function<bool (boost::shared_ptr<ros::Connection> const&, ros::Header const&)> const&) ()
   from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
#1  0x00007f9389f7f80c in ros::ConnectionManager::udprosIncomingConnection(boost::shared_ptr<ros::TransportUDP> const&, ros::Header&) () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
#2  0x00007f9389f5c9a7 in ros::TopicManager::requestTopic(std::string const&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&) () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
#3  0x00007f9389f5dad0 in ros::TopicManager::requestTopicCallback(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&)
    () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
#4  0x00007f9389f494e8 in ros::XMLRPCCallWrapper::execute(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&) ()
   from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
#5  0x00007f938964e82f in XmlRpc::XmlRpcServerConnection::executeMethod(std::string const&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&) () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so
#6  0x00007f9389650e66 in XmlRpc::XmlRpcServerConnection::executeRequest() ()
   from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so
#7  0x00007f938964e4da in XmlRpc::XmlRpcServerConnection::writeResponse() ()
   from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so
#8  0x00007f938964e688 in XmlRpc::XmlRpcServerConnection::handleEvent(unsigned int) ()
   from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so
#9  0x00007f938964c2f7 in XmlRpc::XmlRpcDispatch::work(double) () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so
#10 0x00007f9389f469c7 in ros::XMLRPCManager::serverThreadFunc() () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
#11 0x00007f939db11ce9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#12 0x00007f939e679e9a in start_thread () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
#13 0x00007f939cebaccd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
#14 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
~~~
content.html:
Have one report of a gzserver crash that gave this backtrace:

Core was generated by `gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so vrc_task_1.world -q -r --record_encodin'.
Program terminated with signal 5, Trace/breakpoint trap.
#0  0x00007f9389f316e0 in ros::Connection::initialize(boost::shared_ptr<ros::Transport> const&, bool, boost::function<bool (boost::shared_ptr<ros::Connection> const&, ros::Header const&)> const&) ()
   from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f9389f316e0 in ros::Connection::initialize(boost::shared_ptr<ros::Transport> const&, bool, boost::function<bool (boost::shared_ptr<ros::Connection> const&, ros::Header const&)> const&) ()
   from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
#1  0x00007f9389f7f80c in ros::ConnectionManager::udprosIncomingConnection(boost::shared_ptr<ros::TransportUDP> const&, ros::Header&) () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
#2  0x00007f9389f5c9a7 in ros::TopicManager::requestTopic(std::string const&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&) () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so

    () from /opt/ros/fuerte/lib/libroscpp.so
